synopsis.text:
Ranking first in the Shadowverse World Ranking, Light Tenryuu has earned the title of the 'Strongest Shadowverse Player' and the opportunity to challenge the elite Shadow Seven. Joined by his team, the Seventh Flame club, they embark on a journey to the floating island known as the Shadow Area. The island is divided into seven sectors, each hosting a duel between a challenger and a member of the Shadow Seven. The first team to secure five victories will emerge triumphant.

As the competition unfolds, Mikado Shirogane, who previously faced defeat at Light's hands, seeks redemption against Hiro Ryuugasaki. Meanwhile, the Seventh Flame club prepares to confront their most formidable challenge yet, drawing upon their collective skills and determination. As the battles rage on, the truth behind Arc, Arc Ruler, and the Seven Shadows begins to unravel, with the fate of the world hanging in the balance. Brace yourself for an epic showdown that will determine the ultimate Shadowverse champion!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
